title: Directions: Using Landmarks (Usefulness 9)
description: Traveler usefulness 9/10 phrases for the Using Landmarks subcategory within Directions. Includes 4 card(s).

cards.english: Turn right at the convenience store.
cards.japanese: コンビニで右に曲がる。

cards.english: Turn right at the post office.
Go straight and turn right at the post office.
cards.romaji: Massugu itte, yubinkyoku de migi ni magaru.
cards.japanese: まっすぐ行って、郵便局で右に曲がる。
